post_message: A Montana wildlife official captured video of an unnerving encounter between humans and bears on a bridge in Yellowstone National Park. The footage shows several apparent tourists making a dash to safety after finding themselves a little too close to a black bear sow and her three cubs. No one was injured in the incident, and the animals made their way safely back to the forest, officials said. Read KTLA's story here: @webpagelink
